name: Definitely Not Sokobear Again
description:
This is a little puzzle game I made for NovaLiminal's Chill Vibes Jam!  You solve puzzles by pushing around blocks and stuff.

I made basically this same game last time for Chill Vibes Jam but there was a lot more that I wanted to do with it and I thought maybe I'd come back to it someday.  So I added a bunch of stuff this time.  There are new mechanics, some visual improvements, a map editor, and the bear can wear hats now.
